title: can't stop auto attacking
body:
i play on my mac book and i just want to know if there is anyway i could stop auto attacking minions.
i turned off auto attacking but it still happens. i press the s and h button but it won't stop and i feel really bad when i play a game and that starts to happen. is there anyway to prevent this from happening?

replies.body: I agree with...the previous player's response!  While in-game, open up your options and select Game.  You will find options to toggle off Auto Attack, and another for Attack Move on cursor.  Try those and see if it helps!
Unbind Attack move. Attack move will mover towards target location and attack what ever is in range.
